sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNMMS (SN, MBER_ID, TRNSMIS_NO, RECPTN_NO, MSSAGE_SJ, MSSAGE_CN, TRNSMIS_DT, RQESTER_RESULT_CODE_ID, RQESTER_RESULT_CODE, MSSAGE_ID) VALUES (#sn#, #mberId#, #trnsmisNo#, #recptnNo#, #mssageSj#, #mssageCn#, SYSDATE(), (SELECT CODE_ID FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #rqesterResultNm#), (SELECT CODE FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #rqesterResultNm#), #mssageId#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNMMS SET TRNSMIS_RESULT_CODE_ID = (SELECT CODE_ID FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #trnsmisResultNm#), TRNSMIS_RESULT_CODE = (SELECT CODE FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_NM = #trnsmisResultNm#), TRNSMIS_CONFIRM_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE MSSAGE_ID = #mssageId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.SN, a.TRNSMIS_NO, a.RECPTN_NO, b.CODE_NM AS TRNSMIS_RESULT_NM, c.CODE_NM AS RQESTER_RESULT_NM, a.TRNSMIS_DT, a.TRNSMIS_CONFIRM_DT, a.MSSAGE_ID FROM COMTNMMS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE b ON (a.TRNSMIS_RESULT_CODE_ID = b.CODE_ID AND a.TRNSMIS_RESULT_CODE = b.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON (a.RQESTER_RESULT_CODE_ID = c.CODE_ID AND a.RQESTER_RESULT_CODE = c.CODE) WHERE 1 = 1
a.TRNSMIS_NO LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
a.RECPTN_NO LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
c.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY a.sn DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(a.SN) FROM COMTNMMS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE b ON (a.TRNSMIS_RESULT_CODE_ID = b.CODE_ID AND a.TRNSMIS_RESULT_CODE = b.CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE c ON (a.RQESTER_RESULT_CODE_ID = c.CODE_ID AND a.RQESTER_RESULT_CODE = c.CODE) WHERE 1 = 1
a.TRNSMIS_NO LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
a.RECPTN_NO LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
b.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
c.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')

SELECT a.SN, a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, a.MMS_ATCH_FILE_SJ, a.UPDT_DT FROM COMTNMMSATTACH a NATURAL JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE 1 = 1
a.MMS_ATCH_FILE_SJ LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
ORDER BY a.SN DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(SN) FROM COMTNMMSATTACH a NATURAL JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE 1 = 1
a.MMS_ATCH_FILE_SJ LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')
b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #searchKeyword#,'%')

SELECT a.SN, a.MBER_ID, a.ATCH_FILE_ID, b.ORIGNL_FILE_NM, b.FILE_STRE_COURS, b.FILE_EXTSN, b.STRE_FILE_NM, a.MMS_ATCH_FILE_SJ, a.CREAT_DT, a.UPDT_DT FROM COMTNMMSATTACH a NATURAL JOIN COMTNFILEDETAIL b WHERE a.sn = #sn#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNMMSATTACH (SN, MBER_ID, ATCH_FILE_ID, MMS_ATCH_FILE_SJ, CREAT_DT, UPDT_DT) VALUES (#sn#, #mberId#, #atchFileId#, #mmsAtchFileSj#, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE COMTNMMSATTACH SET MBER_ID = #mberId#, ATCH_FILE_ID = #atchFileId#, MMS_ATCH_FILE_SJ = #mmsAtchFileSj#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE() WHERE SN = #sn#
AND MBER_ID = #mberId#
